{"id":745858545,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"10 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1657695384,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/745858545/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int sumOfArray(vector<int> arr, int low, int high) {\n        int sum = 0;\n        for(int i=low; i<=high; i++) {\n            sum += arr[i];\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n    \n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& arr) {\n        \n        int n = arr.size();\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            if(sumOfArray(arr,0,i-1) == sumOfArray(arr,i+1,n-1)) {\n                return i;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
